alert.note: Alert for Laclede (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 8:44PM CDT until May 08 at 2:16AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Big Piney below Fort Leonard Wood -East Gate affecting Pulaski County. Gasconade River at Jerome affecting Phelps County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Roubidoux Creek Near Waynesville affecting Pulaski County. Gasconade River at Hazelgreen affecting Laclede County. For the Roubidoux Creek...including Waynesville...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Big Piney River...including Fort Leonard Wood - East Gate... Minor flooding is forecast. For the Gasconade River Basin...including Jerome, Hazelgreen...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Gasconade River at Hazelgreen. * WHEN...Until early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, minor flooding begins at the gage site and mainly affects low lying areas along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 17.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 22.8 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday evening at 800 PM CDT.
